H1.text: what countries does the panama canal go through. Colombia

H3.text: what countries does the panama canal go through. Panama Canal Zone

A4.text: The Panama Canal is an artificial waterway in Panama that connects the Caribbean Sea with the Pacific Ocean.

A5.text: Colombia, France, and later the United States controlled the territory surrounding the canal during construction.
